changelog.zh:
- 新增首页刷新播放列表按钮
- 新增首页主题切换按钮（黑暗/明亮模式）
- 新增播放列表复制URL功能
- 实现自动刷新播放列表功能（默认关闭）
- 刷新播放列表时自动应用EPG
- 优化手机端按钮布局，更紧凑
- 优化播放列表卡片布局
- 优化扫码导入对话框响应式布局
- 修复刷新失败时数据丢失问题（使用事务保证数据一致性）
- 修复推荐列表不更新问题
changelog.en:
- Added refresh playlist button on home page
- Added theme toggle button on home page (dark/light mode)
- Added copy URL feature for playlists
- Implemented auto-refresh playlist feature (disabled by default)
- Auto-apply EPG when refreshing playlists
- Optimized mobile button layout for compactness
- Optimized playlist card layout
- Optimized QR import dialog responsive layout
- Fixed data loss issue on refresh failure (using transaction for data consistency)
- Fixed recommended list not updating issue
